snippet: Senator Barbara Boxer published an open letter to Mayor Bob Filner of San Diego, asking him to step down amid more allegations of inappropriate conduct.
abstract: Sen Barbara Boxer publishes open letter to San Diego Mayor Bob Filner asking him to step down amid more allegations of inappropriate sexual conduct.
lead_paragraph: Senator Barbara Boxer published an open letter to Mayor Bob Filner of San Diego, asking him to step down amid more allegations of inappropriate conduct.

headline.main: California: Senator Castigates San Diego Mayor
headline.print_headline: California: Senator Castigates San Diego Mayor
